full_text: From: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @steptoe.com To: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Subject: RE: EPSTEIN, Jeffrey, reg. no. 76318-054 Sent: Fri, 8 Nov 2019 14:30:33 +0000 Thank you, (b)(6). I'll circle back to you if I have any follow-up questions. (b)(6) From: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Sent: Thursday, November 7, 2019 11:34 AM To: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @steptoe.com Subject: Re: EPSTEIN, Jeffrey, reg. no. 76318-054 Good morning (b)(6) My apologies, but I have been away from my desk in meetings the past three days. I received your voicemails regarding the status of Mr. Epstein's personal effects. Presently, while the external investigation continues, any personal property attributable to Mr. Epstein is being held as evidence. Once the outside investigators release the property, we hope to be able to return it to his family as expeditiously as possible. If you have any further questions, please email me and we can try to arrange a mutually convenient time to chat further. Thank you, (b)(6) (b)(7)(C)

text_blocks.content: From: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @steptoe.com To: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Subject: RE: EPSTEIN, Jeffrey, reg. no. 76318-054 Sent: Fri, 8 Nov 2019 14:30:33 +0000
Thank you, (b)(6). I'll circle back to you if I have any follow-up questions. (b)(6)
From: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Sent: Thursday, November 7, 2019 11:34 AM To: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @steptoe.com Subject: Re: EPSTEIN, Jeffrey, reg. no. 76318-054

Good morning (b)(6) My apologies, but I have been away from my desk in meetings the past three days. I received your voicemails regarding the status of Mr. Epstein's personal effects. Presently, while the external investigation continues, any personal property attributable to Mr. Epstein is being held as evidence. Once the outside investigators release the property, we hope to be able to return it to his family as expeditiously as possible. If you have any further questions, please email me and we can try to arrange a mutually convenient time to chat further. Thank you, (b)(6) (b)(7)(C)

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing the status of Jeffrey Epstein's personal effects. The email contains redactions of personal names and email addresses.
